title: Help Finding Wireless Standards Guide
content: Not too long ago, there was a post that included a standards guide for a wireless company. I searched for it but couldn't find it. Does anyone have a quick link to it? Thanks in advance.
author: stotion

comments.content: [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120625071435/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&as_qdr=all&q=%22standards+guide%22+site%3Atypophile.com&btnG=Search) is an advanced google search for the phrase "standards guide". Maybe one of these will be it.
